avatar.title: Picture
avatar.subtitle: My profile picture is visible to everyone on any app using Misakey

content.intro:
Your personnal data protection is our mission. You can at any moment ask for the deletion of your account and your data.
This deletion is permanent: we do not keep backup of your data once deleted.
content.whatDeleteContent: If you ask for account deletion, here is what will be deleted<1><0>Your account, password and the keys of your vault</0><1>The files you saved in the space My documents‚Äù</1><2>All the private spaces you created and the content of those spaces</2><3>All you connexion history and related data</3></1>
content.whatNotDeleteContent: If you ask for account deletion, here is what will not be deleted (but you can delete them manually before):<1><0>The files and messages you sent in spaces you joined.</0><1>Those files and messages will remain attached to an anonymous user (as your user won't exist anymore in our system)</1><2>The files you sent to other users that they saved</2></1>
content.howToContent:
If you want to delete your account, you just have to send an email to our DPO (<1>dpo@misakey.com), asking for deletion.

We will answer your request shortly, it won't be longer than 30 days.

password.title: Password

info.general: Data in this vault are cyphered with a private key. When I lose my password, this private key is no more accessible.
info.exportInfo: Saving my private key helps me keep access to my vault. I am advised not to share my private key with anyone.
